item.title: RESEARCH INTEREST
item.description:
Flexible and Wearable Energy Devices

  • Energy Generate (Triboelectric Nanogenerator)
  • Energy Storage (Flexible Battery)

item.title: PARTICIPATION PROJECT
item.description: • Research on flexible wearable system based on triboelectric nanogenerator (Facilitation, Anhui province)

item.title: RESEARCH EXPERENCES
item.description:
Flexible Energy Storage Related Materials Preparation    09/2020-Present

  • Preparation of cathode electrodes for flexible batteries on silver-plated nylon fabrics by magnetron sputtering method (Undergraduate dissertation).
  • Preparation of separator of zinc ion battery on waste ZrO2 fibers by wet forming method. This work provides a novel perspective for replacing commercial glass fiber separators.
  • Focusing on the low-rate performance issues confronted by vanadium-based materials as cathodes for flexible batteries. We realize rapid electron transfer by constructing heterojunction structures between highly conductive (PPy, MXene, et al.) materials and active substances. This strategy effectively reduces the charge-transfer cell and thus extends the battery duration.

item.title: PREPRINTS and MANUSCRIPTS
item.description: • [1] Wenqi Nie#, Shuai Xu#, Jiangdong Sun, et al. Scale-production, stretchable, fiber triboelectric nanogenerator construct of customizable textile as human motion recognition (Advanced Fiber Materials, under review)

item.title: SELECTED PUBLICATIONS
item.description: • [1] Shuai Xu#, Wenqi Nie#, Jiangdong Sun, et al. Multi-mode and durable fiber triboelectric nanogenerator for power and sensor enabled by Hookean vascular stent structure.Chemical Engineering Journal, 2023,472,145088. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cej.2023.145088.

item.title: PARTICIPATION PUBLICATIONS
item.description: • [1] Jiangdong Sun, Wenqi Nie, Shuai Xu, et al. A honeycomb-like ammonium-ion fiber battery with high and stable performance for wearable energy storage. Polymers 2022, 14, 4149. https://doi.org/10.3390/polym14194149.
